description: In addition to the in-class experience shared with Chemistry 106 and described above, this course offers a laboratory component with experiments that feature the use of forensic techniques to collect and analyze evidence including fingerprinting, drug analysis, alcohol investigation, DNA fingerprinting, and fiber analysis. Students attend three classes and one 3-hour laboratory per week. Offered alternate Spring Semesters.
name: Forensic Sci With Lab
notes: Students in Chem 107 must also register for lab Chem 107L.
title: Forensic Science with Lab
